translations: 沉思，冥想；打算，意图；凝视，默默注视

sentences.sentence: He sat there deep in contemplation.
The archetypal extrovert prefers action to contemplation, risk-taking to heed-taking, certainty to doubt.
sentences.translation: 典型的外向者更喜欢行动而不是沉思，喜欢冒险而不是谨慎，喜欢确定性而不是疑虑。

sentences.sentence: Even in the busiest museums there are many rooms and many pictures worth hours of contemplation which the crowds largely ignore.
sentences.translation: 即使是最繁忙的博物馆，里面也有许多值得人们沉思几小时的小房间和画像，但大多数人都对它们视而不见。
